column1: ##Project Description=Human cells from cartilage and meniscus (healthy) for 3' SC v3.1 RNA seq 10x Protocol CG000315 Rev B Dual Index  Sample Date = 10/26/2021  2 samples:  Sample 1: cartilage cells Target ~10,000 cells Target 20,000 reads/cell, ~200 million reads/sample  Sample 2: meniscus cells Target ~10,000 cells Target 20,000 reads/cell, ~200 million reads/sample  NextSeq Flowcell = P3 100 cycle flowcell, shared with Alvarez-Garcia/Jasmin (sample date 10/22/2021)  From Elan: Basic Details: 	  Sample Submission ID	68_3821  User	Swahn Hannah  Lab	Lotz  Account Code	(08)RAG049617B(C3-554316)-100.00%  Fee	0.00 USD  Discount	0.00%  Actual Fee	  Quoted Amount	  Expected Date	  Actual Date	  Service Id	ca_ns_lotz_2021026_0_10X3prime_HS 	 	 Project Information:	 Study title	Osteoarthritis in Cartilage and Meniscus (Continuation of Project Started by Tomas Duffy) Sample Type description (e.g. Jurkat cell line: liver tissue)	healthy cartilage and meniscus submitted to Tony on 10/26/2021 Species	human 	 Services:	 Please briefly describe what you would like the Genomics Core to do for you	10x Genomics single cell RNAseq 	 Samples:	 Number of Samples submitted	2 How many reads per sample are needed?
